mapper.insert: INSERT INTO template (category_id, user_id, title, description, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO template_question (template_id, question_text, question_type, sort_order) VALUES (#{templateId}, #{questionText}, #{questionType}, #{sortOrder})
INSERT INTO template_option (question_id, option_text, sort_order) VALUES (#{questionId}, #{optionText}, #{sortOrder})
mapper.update: UPDATE template SET category_id = #{categoryId}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM template WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.category_id, q.user_id, q.title, q.description, q.status, q.created_at, q.updated_at, qq.id AS question_id, qq.template_id, qq.question_text, qq.question_type, qq.sort_order AS question_sort_order, qo.id AS option_id, qo.question_id AS option_question_id, qo.option_text, qo.sort_order AS option_sort_order FROM template q LEFT JOIN template_question qq ON q.id = qq.template_id LEFT JOIN template_option qo ON qq.id = qo.question_id WHERE q.id = #{id} AND q.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM template WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY updated_at DESC

SELECT * FROM template WHERE status = 'publish' ORDER BY usage_count DESC
SELECT * FROM template WHERE status = 'publish' AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY usage_count DESC
